title: 03/18/22 DPS Hour 2 Pete Dorey & Tom Pelissero
itunes:title: 03/18/22 DPS Hour 2 Pete Dorey & Tom Pelissero
description:
In hour 2, the Packers drama has been almost higher than the Farve era. Pete Dorey joins the show to talk Aaron Rodgers and Davante Adams. Tom Pelissero also joins to talk more about the Green Bay Packers and their future. While also going over some possible landing spots for Deshaun Watson as well.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
